entries.next: I have satisfied my yearning for revenge and achieved a certain quietus. I thank you again for your help.
entries.cantwork: I have a mission of compelling importance available to you, once you are not so busy.
entries.npc_reset: Your cavalier dismissal of my urgent need for revenge dissatisfies me.
entries.npc_1_1: Have you ever seen the holopainting of our beloved Emperor with his hand held high, receiving the adulation of a huge crowd? Yes, that's right, 'Palpatine Triumphant.' That was mine. It made me famous on Coruscant. Now I'm back home seeking a certain critic, the slime-toad Faswald Vorsuble. The acid he spouted about my first showing, decades ago, I shall not repeat. For years I have planned to teach him a lesson. You can teach it. I want you to destroy his vacation home.
entries.npc_2_1: Good. I have the wilderness coordinates of his home right here. I believe he has some kind of large pet as a guard, so have a care.
entries.npc_3_1: You seem too concerned by issues of legality. You won't have much place in the New Order if you keep on that way.
entries.npc_4_1: 'Legal'? This is the New Order. What's 'legal' is whatever the Empire says is legal. And nowadays I have friends so high up in the Empire that, essentially, what's legal is whatever I say is legal. Will you destroy Vorsuble's home or not?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: I grow impatient for you to carry out my revenge. Go!
entries.npc_reward_1: Immensely cathartic. Yet still I feel the canker in my heart, demanding further revenge. I may have more work for you soon.
entries.npc_work_1: Haven't you destroyed Faswald Vorsuble's vacation home? I anticipate the calamity so strongly, I can hardly contain myself.
entries.npc_noloc_1: I am waiting for an informant to relay to me the location of Vorsuble's vacation home. Check with me shortly.
entries.npc_failure_1: You were perhaps too squeamish to destroy that home? Well, I can always find someone else to enact my just revenge.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_3_1: Destroying a critic's home for one bad review may be satisfying, but it isn't legal, is it?
entries.npc_1_2: I still recall the awful things the critic Faswald Vorsuble wrote about me all those years ago. 'Spews color in erratic gobs, like the trail of blood from a wounded mynock.' I cannot rest until Faswald Vorsuble knows, first-hand, what a trail of blood looks like -- close up. I want you to destroy him. Trust me. You'll do the galactic arts community a favor.
entries.npc_2_2: Good. As you cut down Faswald Vorsuble with blaster fire, be calm, for this is the man who called me 'an egomaniacal dabbler.'
entries.npc_3_2: When this is the man who called me 'hopeless in talent and, by all reports, in personal character,' you can allow him to live?
entries.npc_4_2: 'I have not discerned who trained this neophyte Chassu. Perhaps no reputable teacher will admit to foisting on the galaxy this ninth-rate purveyor of puerile, polychromatic poppycock.' I ask you, can you allow this inhuman vandal of character to survive a moment longer?
entries.npc_backtowork_2: I still burn at Vorsuble's words: 'Depicts human faces as though viewing them through a Gran's third eye.' This man must die, and you are idly waiting here. Go!
entries.npc_reward_2: 'Shows a philosophy of artistic composition that seems derived from the scrap-heaps of Doaba Guerfel.' A man who says that of me deserves to die.
entries.npc_work_2: Every moment burns Vorsuble's words more deeply in my memory: 'An artist who apparently seeks to start a new movement called Incoherence.' Do not return until he is dead, do you hear?
entries.npc_noloc_2: I have a probe droid looking for Vorsuble right now. In moments, I expect to know his location. Talk to me then.
entries.npc_failure_2: No! I cannot believe that this odious man still draws breath. It is an offense against the galaxy. Mark me -- I shall see him destroyed.
entries.otherescort_2: I daresay you're talking to the wrong person.
entries.dontknowyou_2: I want nothing to do with you.
entries.npc_breech_2: It is some ruffian. Protect me, or you are fired!
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_3_2: What else did Vorsuble write about you?
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_4: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_4: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_5: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_5: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_6: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_6: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.npc_reset_1: Your cavalier dismissal of my urgent need for revenge dissatisfies me.
entries.npc_reset_2: Your cavalier dismissal of my urgent need for revenge dissatisfies me.
